question: Question: This law mathematically explains the shape of the Debye-Scherrer cones which appear in powder diffraction. [10] Name this law which states that for a wave incident on a crystal lattice, maximum scattering peaks will occur where two times the lattice spacing times the sine of the incident angle equals an integer multiple of the wavelength.
